snippet: Samsung says it will sell a kit to allow consumers to reboot their TV sets to keep up with the latest developments.
abstract: Samsung says it will sell a kit to allow consumers to reboot their TV sets to keep up with the latest developments.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS -- The idea of a smart television is a few years old, but it is evolving so rapidly that Samsung Electronics is worried that consumers may be reluctant to buy a television for fear of missing out on the next big thing.

headline.main: TVs That Keep Up With Evolution
